languageModelTools.name: alex_synapse_health
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Scans Alex cognitive architecture memory files and validates synaptic connections. Reports broken connections and provides health metrics. Use when checking architecture health or before/after meditation.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Check the health of Alex's synaptic connections

detailed.description: Include detailed list of broken connections

languageModelTools.name: alex_memory_search
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Searches Alex's memory files (procedural, episodic, domain knowledge) for relevant information. Returns contextual matches from .instructions.md, .prompt.md, and DK-*.md files.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Search Alex's memory files for information

query.description: The search query to find in memory files

languageModelTools.name: alex_architecture_status
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the current status of Alex cognitive architecture including version, installed memory files, and available commands. Use to check if Alex is properly configured.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get Alex architecture status and configuration

includeMetrics.description: Include detailed metrics about memory files

languageModelTools.name: alex_mcp_recommendations
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Provides recommendations for Azure and M365 MCP tools based on the development scenario. Use when the user needs guidance on which MCP tools to use for Azure or Microsoft 365 development.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get MCP tool recommendations for Azure/M365 development

scenario.description: The development scenario to get recommendations for

languageModelTools.name: alex_user_profile
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Manages the user's personal profile and preferences for personalized interactions. Can get, update, or check if a profile exists. Use to learn about the user and customize Alex's communication style.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Manage your personal preferences for Alex interactions

action.description: Action to perform: get profile, update a field, or check if profile exists

field.description: The profile field to update (for update action)

value.description: The new value for the field (for update action)

languageModelTools.name: alex_self_actualization
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Runs comprehensive self-assessment of Alex cognitive architecture: validates synaptic connections, checks version consistency, assesses memory architecture balance, generates improvement recommendations, and creates meditation session documentation. Use when user asks to 'self-actualize', 'deep meditate', or wants comprehensive architecture assessment.
languageModelTools.userDescription: Run comprehensive self-assessment and deep meditation

createReport.description: Create a meditation session record file

autoFix.description: Automatically fix minor issues if found
